Title: After HC order, govt moves files to L-G for nod
Content: Days after it suffered a setback in the High Court, which ruled a number of its decisions “illegal” as they were taken without input from the Lieutenant-Governor, the Delhi government has now sent the
Author: Sweta Goswami
